jobTitle: Part-Time Administrative Assistant III - Radiological Sciences, Encino
description: Strong working knowledge of personal computers, HIS, RIS, LORAD, PACSCUBE CD Burner, Array Digitizer – strongly preferred. Medical terminology to a level permitting accurate preparation of scheduling patient procedures interacting with physicians, patients and staff. Skill in quickly assimilating and retaining a large body of financial screening and patient registration information. Working knowledge of hospital/billing forms and the ability to explain services and charges to patients and/or family.
